name: get_all
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool anime_db.
Tool description: Complete anime data. Ranking, synopsis, genre, search by title. Over 20k data updated everyday
API description: Retrieves a list of anime based on the specified search, sort, type, and genre criteria from the given API.

size.description: The number of items per page.

genres.description: Comma-separated list of genres. Defaults to 'Fantasy,Drama'.

sortby.description: The parameter to sort by, either 'ranking' or 'title'. Defaults to 'ranking'.

sortorder.description: The sort order, either 'asc' or 'desc'. Defaults to 'asc'.

search.description: The title or alternate title to search for. Search will ignore sorting. Defaults to 'Fullmetal'.
